mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice_comment ( comment_no, board_no, user_no, user_id, content, reg_date ) VALUES ( Notice_comment_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{userId}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_no, board_no, user_no, user_id, content, reg_date FROM notice_comment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY comment_no DESC
